Small Business Invoice Manager

- Single-file Python 3 script to create, edit, and store invoices for a small business.
- Command-line interface with menu-driven options for:
  - Creating new invoices with customer name, date, line items (description, quantity, unit price), and tax rate.
  - Listing all saved invoices with summary info (ID, customer, date, total).
  - Viewing detailed invoice by ID.
  - Editing existing invoices.
  - Deleting invoices.
  - Exporting invoices as simple text files for printing.
- Data persistence via a single JSON file storing all invoices locally.
- Input validation for numeric fields and dates.
- Supports keyboard navigation via menu numbers and confirmation prompts.
- Offline-first; no network dependencies.
- Well-structured code with functions for each feature and main loop for easy extensibility.
- Runs in standard Python 3 environment using only standard library modules (e.g., json, datetime, os).
